short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will provide some predefined messages for the WordPress Slack

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After activating the plugin and browsing to wordpress.slack.com, you will find a dropdown in the top right corner with some predefined messages that can be used to inform others of what is happening or what to do next. In some channels some specific messages might be added only related to that channel.
